summary: Provides a unit test suite that validates the parsing and field values of 802.11 Power‑Save Poll (PS‑Poll) control frames using the impacket library, checking header size, association ID, BSSID, and transmitter address.
business_intent: Ensures the correctness and standards‑compliance of Wi‑Fi PS‑Poll frame handling in the impacket implementation, supporting reliable network analysis and development.
